text.__SUMMARY__: Inga chiapensis is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae. It is found only in Mexico.
text.References: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Inga chiapensis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T38306A10109529. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T38306A10109529.en. Retrieved 18 December 2017.
